resources.string: 用于显示简约系列主题，支持多幅、可更换壁纸，支持时钟位置调整
当壁纸宽度超过屏宽时，感应重力卷动壁纸。（提示：可通过按住屏幕阻止灭屏）
"This theme pack's resources are incomplete or incompatible. Please choose another theme pack."
Please add city in desktop weather
Getting magazine list from the Internet...
1. Swipe up to unlock, swipe down for notification bar
2. Tap and hold camera icon then swipe up to start camera
3. Swipe left or right to turn page
5. Subscribe to more magazines in Settings
"6. When screens half off, clicking screen's edges (left or right) will resume"
Download the latest issues of subscribed magazines

"Magazine updates will fill but not exceed the maximum amount you've allocated below.
Current settings:"
Need WLAN connection to update every 24 hours

"Magazine packages contain many large files and use a large amount of data traffic. We strongly recommend downloading them on WLAN.
Continue?"
First, please go to \"Subscribe to Magazine\" and select the type of magazine you want. Enable \"Auto update magazine\"?
Dear user, %s needs Internet connection while in use. Do you agree?
Set the shortcut app to pop-up when you long-press the lockscreen interface
Are you sure you want to delete?
Are you sure you want to delete selected picture(s)?
Adding pictures, please wait a moment
My periodical holds up to %1$d. Can not add more
My periodical holds up to %1$d, you can only add %2$d, please reselection
Activated \"Auto page flip when screen illuminates\"
Deactivated \"Auto page flip when screen illuminates\"
First, choose the picture from the list that you want to move. Next, find the target location and then click the Insert button to insert a picture into the target position.
Loading periodicals, please wait a moment
Android Beam can not work in safe lock state
"No Internet Access Detected, won't automatically reconnect."
Not connected to file transfer server
Connected to device for Internet access
Sharing local Internet connection with device
Pairing grants access to your contacts and call history when connected.
"Couldn't pair with %1$s because of an incorrect PIN or passkey."
Type %s PUK and new PIN code
The %1$s card is missing or not readable. Insert a %1$s card.
"Your %1$s card has been permanently disabled. Contact your wireless service provider for another %1$s card."
%s is now disabled. Enter PUK code to continue. Contact carrier for details.
Re-enter the correct PUK code. Repeated attempts will permanently disable the %s.
Incorrect %s PIN code you must now contact your carrier to unlock your device.
You already entered the wrong unlock password %d times. If you do not enter the correct password in %d tries, the phone will reset to the factory default settings and all user data will be lost
Please enter lenovo and click OK to continue entering password
Press the power button to instantly lock the screen
Lenovo Lock Screen is a basic device manager. Do not disable
Warning: Disabling Lenovo Lock Screen will cause a lock screen error
Force quit: press \"Volume+\" and then \"Volume-\" within 3 seconds
Use the proximity sensor to avoid inadvertent operations when the phone is in your pocket
The front camera will use face detection to unlock the phone during \"Slide\" lock screen. This might not work in poor lighting
When Keyguard is active, if there is an unread event, the device will vibrate
Double tap to turn off screen
"In the lockscreen interface, double tapping will turn off the screen if you don't touch anything else"
Show single empty slot hints only when no card in either slot
Slide in any direction to unlock
Slide left or right to switch wallpaper
Long press and drag to change the clock location
For enhanced security, the keypad will shuffle when screen turns on
Drag up to view Call logs
Slide in any direction to launch camera
Slide in any direction to view unread messages
Slide in any direction to view missed calls
Long-press the screen to play the game
Lockscreen does not support this theme
Tilt left and right to control skateboard movement
Please use your account login to unlock
"If you have forgotten your Lenovo account password, You can log into passport.lenovo.com to retrieve it"
Type SIM PUK and new PIN code
The SIM card is missing or not readable. Insert a SIM card.
"Your SIM card has been permanently disabled. Contact your wireless service provider for another SIM card."
SIM is now disabled. Enter PUK code to continue. Contact carrier for details.
SIM \"%1$s\" is now disabled. Enter PUK code to continue. Contact carrier for details.
Type a PIN that is 4 to 8 numbers.
PUK code should be 8 numbers or more.
Re-enter the correct PUK code. Repeated attempts will permanently disable the SIM.

"You have incorrectly typed your PIN %d times.
Try again in %d seconds."

"You have incorrectly typed your password %d times.
Try again in %d seconds."

"You have incorrectly drawn your unlock pattern %d times.
Try again in %d seconds."
You have incorrectly attempted to unlock the phone %d times. After %d more unsuccessful attempts, this phone will be reset, which will delete all its data.
You have incorrectly attempted to unlock the phone %d times. This phone will be reset, which will delete all its data.
You have incorrectly attempted to unlock the phone %d times. After %d more unsuccessful attempts, this user will be removed, which will delete all user data.
You have incorrectly attempted to unlock the phone %d times. This user will be removed, which will delete all user data.
You have incorrectly attempted to unlock the phone %d times. After %d more unsuccessful attempts, the work profile will be removed, which will delete all profile data.
You have incorrectly attempted to unlock the phone %d times. The work profile will be removed, which will delete all profile data.

"You have incorrectly drawn your unlock pattern %d times. After %d more unsuccessful attempts, you will be asked to unlock your phone using an email account.
Try again in %d seconds."
Incorrect SIM PIN code you must now contact your carrier to unlock your device.
SIM is unusable. Contact your carrier.
Pattern required when you restart device.
PIN required when you restart device.
Password required when you restart device.
Pattern required when you switch profiles.
PIN required when you switch profiles.
Password required when you switch profiles.
Manually adjust the brightness, use the slide bar to change the value
>> Swipe right goes to Plug-in page
You can recover it in \"Settings-Notification center\".
Are you sure you want to activate airplane mode?
Please tap after closing night eye protection mode
Click to close night eye protection mode
Allow the following apps to send notifications
Apps not allowed to send notifications
Allow playing notification sound when Do Not Disturb is set to Custom
%1$d notification(s) sent in the past week
Try long-pressing to quickly manage notifications
You have not processed 80% of notifications. Come take a look
In the past 10 days, the notification bar has had 200 notifications. Come take a look
In the past week, the notification bar has had %1$d notification(s). Come and take a look at the notification assistant
You have not processed %1$s of notifications. Come take a look at the notification assistant
Are there a lot of notifications?
Please check again in a few days
Not a lot of notice, please check again in a few days
The notification bar is clean. You get 5 stars!
Not bad. The notifications are managed well! Good job
A lot of notifications. Can you handle it?
%s notification(s) sent in the past week

"If you turn off notifications for this app, you may miss important alerts and updates.
You can recover from the \"Settings - Notification center - App notification management\" menu."
Storage lacking of space or unmounted, please check the storage state
USB is open, please close and try again!
Built-in storage card unavailable. Unable to take screenshots
Long screenshot not supported for current window
Drag here to adjust the start position of the screenshot
Drag here to adjust the end position of the screenshot
Click to hide the notification bar
Switching the main data card is supported
Plug-in page will show user-defined message
Music, videos, games, and other media
Drag and drop icons to arrange your Quick Settings
Icons above will be displayed in Quick Settings
Switch positions will be dynamically adjusted based on usage
Failed to get data. Please check the network connection

"Screen pinning locks the display in a single view.
To unpin,long press Back."
Show Relevant App By Double Finger
Tap to switch to fast charging mode
Read information from other phones or U disks
Tap to switch to OTG mode
Low battery. Unable to be used
Low battery. Unable to fast charge
Go to the specified interface to configure this plug-in

Would you like to enable Plug-in page? Dear user, Plug-in page needs internet connection while in use as it provides weather, schedules, and other information for you on the fly. Do you agree? (You can change this later in Settings>Notification center menu.)
To limit data traffic in the background, when Smart battery saver is on, some plug-ins may not be able to normally connect to the network and get refreshed.
Please remove some widgets and then try again.
OTG storage device drive is mounted
Touch to turn off the flashlight
The camera is now in use, cannot turn on the flashlight
Flashlight cannot be turned on if top edge is covered
Unable to use flashlight in super battery saver
Call in progress! Unable to use flashlight
The switch order has been adjusted based on your use habits.

"To help improve battery life, Smart battery saver reduces your device's performance and limits vibration, location services, and most background data. Email, messaging, and other apps that rely on syncing may not update unless you open them."
"This change isn't allowed by your administrator"
Choose an app for the USB device
"If you turn on USB storage, some apps you're using will stop and may be unavailable until you turn off USB storage."

"Raise volume above recommended level?
Listening at high volume for long periods may damage your hearing."
Until you turn off Do Not Disturb
This device doesn’t support this %s. Touch to set up in a supported format.
Unmount %s before removing to avoid data loss
Clear default in System settings > Apps > Downloaded.
Your charger voltage is too high. Charging stopped
Your battery temperature is too high. Charging stopped
Your battery is over current-protection. Please remove the battery!
Your battery voltage is too high. Please remove the battery!
Charging timeout. Please disconnect the charger!
Your battery temperature is too low. Charging stopped
Battery temperature is too high. Phone will shutdown
The current interface will use Gaussian blur effect as the background
Forces a status bar tint for all apps
%s remaining. Smart battery saver is on.
"USB charging not supported. Use only the supplied charger."
Allow the app %1$s to access the USB device?
Allow the app %1$s to access the USB accessory?
Open %1$s when this USB device is connected?
Open %1$s when this USB accessory is connected?
No installed apps work with this USB accessory. Learn more about this accessory at %1$s
Use by default for this USB device
Use by default for this USB accessory
"The user currently signed in to this device can't turn on USB debugging. To use this feature, switch to the primary user “%s”."
"Can't take screenshot due to limited storage space, or it isn't allowed by the app or your organization."
Install Android File Transfer app for Mac
Do not disturb on, priority only.
Do not disturb on, total silence.
Do not disturb on, alarms only.

"Because your set data limit was reached, the device has paused data usage for the remainder of this cycle.
Resuming may lead to charges from your carrier."
Screen is locked in landscape orientation.
Screen is locked in portrait orientation.
Screen is now locked in landscape orientation.
Screen is now locked in portrait orientation.
You won’t be disturbed by sounds and vibrations, except from alarms, reminders, events, and callers you specify.
This blocks ALL sounds and vibrations, including from alarms, music, videos, and games. You’ll still be able to make phone calls.
This blocks ALL sounds and vibrations, including from alarms, music, videos, and games.
Swipe up to unlock from anywhere
Swipe from icon for voice assist
Total silence. This will also silence screen readers.
All apps and data in this session will be deleted.
Do you want to continue your session?
To delete apps and data, remove guest user

"When you add a new user, that person needs to set up their space.
Any user can update apps for all other users."
"%s will start capturing everything that's displayed on your screen."

"Your device is managed by %1$s.
Your administrator can monitor and manage settings, corporate access, apps, data associated with your device, and your device's location information. For more information, contact your administrator."

"You gave an app permission to set up a VPN connection.
This app can monitor your device and network activity, including emails, apps, and websites."

"Your device is managed by %1$s.
Your administrator can monitor and manage settings, corporate access, apps, data associated with your device, and your device's location information.
You're connected to a VPN, which can monitor your network activity, including emails, apps, and websites.
For more information, contact your administrator."

"Your work profile is managed by %1$s.
Your administrator is capable of monitoring your network activity including emails, apps, and websites.
For more information, contact your administrator.
You're also connected to a VPN, which can monitor your network activity."
"You're connected to %1$s, which can monitor your network activity including emails, apps, and websites."
"You're connected to %1$s, which can monitor your personal network activity, including emails, apps, and websites."

"Your work profile is managed by %1$s. It is connected to %2$s, which can monitor your work network activity, including emails, apps, and websites.
For more information, contact your administrator."

"Your work profile is managed by %1$s. It is connected to %2$s, which can monitor your work network activity, including emails, apps, and websites.
You're also connected to %3$s, which can monitor your personal network activity."

"Your device is managed by %1$s.
Your administrator can monitor and manage settings, corporate access, apps, data associated with your device, and your device's location information.
You're connected to %2$s, which can monitor your network activity, including emails, apps, and websites.
For more information, contact your administrator."
Device will stay locked until you manually unlock
This keeps it in view until you unpin. Touch and hold Back and Overview at the same time to unpin.
This keeps it in view until you unpin. Touch and hold Overview to unpin.
It will reappear the next time you turn it on in settings.
%1$s wants to be the volume dialog.
Show battery level percentage inside the status bar icon when not charging
"You won't hear your next alarm %1$s unless you turn this off before then"
Fun for some but not for all
System UI Tuner gives you extra ways to tweak and customize the Android user interface. These experimental features may change, break, or disappear in future releases. Proceed with caution.
These experimental features may change, break, or disappear in future releases. Proceed with caution.
Congrats! System UI Tuner has been added to Settings
Remove System UI Tuner from Settings and stop using all of its features?
